Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Well^reset; is extremely important, for it provides life-giving ^orange;Water^reset; for numerous purposes. Build one at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;. Once it fills for a while, harvest some ^orange;Water^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 井中的水会逐渐增加。如果有100份以上，你就可以收集它。可以用于制作物品，创造湖泊或放在水培托盘中。
Texts.Eng: Water in wells will gradually increase. When you have 100 or more, you can harvest it. It can be used in crafting, thrown to create lakes or placed in a Hydroponics Tray.
